name: SHIP-HATS
description: SHIP (Secure Hybrid Integration Pipeline)-HATS (Hive Agile Testing Solutions) is a multi-tenanted SaaS for all applications that is classified as restricted and below. It provides security and governance guardrails that enables developers to plan, build, test and deploy code to production.

documentations.name: Getting Started
documentations.description: Learn about SHIP-HATS, onboard to SHIP-HATS, set yourself as a Subscription Administrator

documentations.name: Portal
documentations.description: Learn how to onboard to the SHIP-HATS portal, add projects, set Project Administrators, and manage users
